title: New York On Tech: 2015 Holiday Party, Celebrating Innovation
desc: EVENT OVERVIEW New York On Tech (NYOT)? is on a mission to prepare the next generation of technology leaders emerging from NYC by providing low-opportunity youth with the development, mentoring, networks and access they need to pursue degrees and careers in tech. This year we are working with 9 high schools and 40 mentors who represent 27 tech companies here in NYC to make this possible!? Join us and 100+ other professionals to celebrate innovation at our annual Holiday Party at LinkedIn NYC. The night will include an open bar (6pm - 7pm), raffles, free food, live music by DJ Fiasco? and great networking. Members?of the NYOT community represent companies such?General Assembly, American Express, Pandora Radio, MTV, MakerBot and the Huffington Post. ? INQUIRIES / MEDIA / PRESS? Please email? hello@newyorkontech.org ?with any questions. Alert: You must RSVP before Nov 30th to attend the event. The event is free, but there is a highly suggested donation of $30.00 per guest.? Refund Policy:?Refunds will not be issued for this event.
